title: Reagent Protocol
description: Shawn Doolish. Fallen shadow mage, mass-murder, slaver, master of soul torture, former Confederation bigwig, and recent Guild recruit.Banshee. Tortured teenager, son of a Guild hero, on the run from the law after one last run-in with a bully.What do they have in common other than a reason to hide? The Reagent Protocol; a Heroes' Guild program to rehabilitate supers who crossed the line and now seek redemption.After all, the only difference between a monster and a man is the desire and willingness to change.
author: S.W. Douglas
